question.title: Longest Common Prefix
prompt: Write a function to find the longest common prefix string amongst an array of strings.
If there is no common prefix, return an empty string {{ "" }}.

explanations: There is no common prefix among the input strings, thus the result is an empty string "".

constraints: All given inputs are in lowercase letters "a-z".
hints: Try to think of the problem in terms of matching characters from the beginning of the strings.
